ja458:8.1: ca vaṇṇo ca → āyuñca vaṇṇañca (bj, pts-vp-pli1)
ja458:9.3: Hāyateva tava → hāyate vata te (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, mr); hāyateva tato (pts-vp-pli1)
ja458:11.4: Kathaṃ nu devāna → kathaṃ na devānaṃ (pts-vp-pli1)
ja458:16.2: saṅgarattā idhāgato → saṅgaratthā idhāgato (bj, pts-vp-pli1); saṅkaratthāyidhāgato (sya1ed, sya2ed)
ja458:19.3: jahati → jahāti (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1); jahātī (?)
ja458:20.2: Bhariyā yāpi dhanena hoti kītā → bhariyā sāmiko sadhanena hoti (sya1ed, sya2ed); bhariyāpi dhanena honti atittā (mr)
ja458:21.1: parabhojananti ñatvā → kāyo parabhojananti viditvā (sya1ed, sya2ed); kāyo ca parabhojanaṃ viditvā (mr)
ja458:21.2: sugatiñca duggatiñca → sugatī ca duggatī ca (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1); suggatiṃ duggatiñca (mr)
